summary: A collection of lightweight helper classes and utilities that model binary data elements (bits, bytes, words, 64‑bit integers, 24‑bit big‑endian values) and assemble them into protocol packet objects, with a metaclass to automate packet class creation and representation.
business_intent: Enable developers to easily construct, parse, and manipulate network protocol packets by providing typed, mutable field wrappers and automated packet class generation, reducing low‑level binary handling errors.
